SaGa 3: The Ruler of Time and Space: Shadow or Light

name: SaGa 3: Jikuu no Hasha: Shadow or Light
overview: SaGa 3: Jikuu no Hasha - Shadow or Light is a Role-Playing game, developed by Racjin and published by Square Enix, which was released in Japan in 2011.
